name: Possessor: Soul Ajar
description:
A quirky, reverse haunting, where you play as the ghost. Well, until you possess someone!

Content Warning Swearing, references to death, ego death, flashing lights.

Credits:

Concept and Author: GreenClovers

Background and Sprites: Verndusk

Character Concept Art: Makorie and Cosmic_heartz

Music: Kaelhazard

SFX: Ultimate SFX bundle by Sidearm Studios

Built using the Godot engine

Written using Ink
